### % en ejecucion 

```{r}
articles <- 25
gauge(articles, min = 0, max = 100, symbol = "%",
      gaugeSectors(
        warning = c(0,articles)
      ))
```

### % ejecutado 

```{r}
articles <- 66
gauge(articles, min = 0, max = 100, symbol = "%",
      gaugeSectors(
        success = c(0,articles)
      ))
```
